hero.headline: Get Your Free Health Sharing Quote
hero.subheadline: See how much you can save in under 2 minutes
hero.description: Compare all six of our health sharing plans instantly. No personal information required to see rates. Get accurate pricing based on your age, location, and tobacco status.

calculator.title: Calculate Your Monthly Sharing Amount
calculator.description: Select your preferences below to see personalized rates for all available plans. All estimates include access to virtual care, mental health services, and our member mobile app.
calculator.disclaimer: Rates shown are estimates only. Final sharing amounts are determined at enrollment and subject to underwriting and member guidelines. Not traditional health insurance.

points.text: Trusted by over 100,000 members nationwide with a proven track record of sharing medical expenses
Average savings of 40-60% compared to traditional health insurance premiums
Choose any doctor or hospital - no network restrictions or referral requirements
Fast enrollment process - typically covered within 1-2 weeks of application approval
24/7 access to virtual care and our award-winning mobile app for managing your account
Join a caring community committed to supporting each other's health and wellness

form.title: Ready to Get Started?
form.description: Fill out this quick form to receive personalized plan recommendations and speak with one of our healthcare advisors. No obligation and your information is completely secure.
